Hello, My Name
Is Tyler Goelz.

I'm a full-time traveler and front-end developer living a passion driven lifestyle.
I strive to make the world a better place through technology.

My Approach To
Work-Life Hapiness

Finding and following my passion in life has been more valuable, fulfilling, and rewarding than finding any profression.

  • Passion Driven Lifestyle (#PDL)

    Meeting new people, learning new cultures, and helping others are passions that drive my life.

  • Write, write, write. (#ABAA)

    Writing about my passions inspire others to find and follow what makes their life more complete.

  • Heuristic & Holistic

    A guided, all-encompassing, modern approach to technology makes for world class products.

  • Smarter Not Harder

    Using modern toolsets like Angular, Bower, Grunt, and CoffeeScript while continuously evolving my workflow makes for a lean, effective process.

  • #OpenSourceEverything

    Open sourcing technology and process helps build honest, close-knit, secure communities.

  • Cutting Edge Toolset

    Combining, contributing, and creating open source technology keeps my toolsets at the top of their game.

Current Muses

*Muse /myooz/ (noun): A low-maintenance business that generates significant income.

A Beard Across America

#ABAA is an eBook filled with real life stories of my road-trip across America. The eBook is being written to help readers look at something seemingly impossible and redefine it as achievable.

Be The First To Read #ABAA

Beard & Fedora

Beard (Me) & Fedora (Joel Serino) are two like-minded, driven dudes traveling the world together. Our current #OpenSource projects include HopStack, StachStack, MaryJS, and WriteOn.

Check Us Out On Github

Get In Touch

Whether you want to talk shop, share a funny meme, or tell me about your cray aunt, I'd love to hear from you.
